text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump Where is Pence? Where is the Covid-19 medical team? If I wanted to see a President campaigning for election I would watch political ads. https://t.co/QdNFmb3O77 big a key are you going to give Joe Biden to the WH front door.
